lead_paragraph: To reconnect with the primal vastness of the earth, the author and his girlfriend deliberately avoided flying on their trip.
snippet: To reconnect with the primal vastness of the earth, the author and his girlfriend deliberately avoided flying on their trip.

headline.main: Book Review: ‘Grounded: A Down to Earth Journey Around the World’
